game.name: A Juggler's Tale
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 꼭두각시 애비와 함께 수수께끼, 함정, 추격자로 가득한, 음산한 동화 속 세계를 탐험해보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead Abby the string puppet through a bruised, but beautiful fairy tale world in this cinematic adventure. Solve riddles, evade traps and shake off pursuers on the way to find freedom. Can Abby take control of her fate with all the strings attached?
